tool_description: An API for current and historical foreign exchange rates published by the European Central Bank.
name: Exchange Rate
title: Exchange Rate

api_list.name: Symbols
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate9.p.rapidapi.com/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate9.p.rapidapi.com/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
